article_title: Combating HIV/AIDS: Minnesota has serious access issues for students who need Truvada

article_metadata.description: CC/Flickr/ChauncerAt the University of Minnesota, access to Truvada, generally termed PrEP, is not available on studen

og.description: To address the HIV-disparities occurring in younger populations, we need to require the Minnesota colleges and universities to cover this treatment for those who need it.
